name: Sapan
description:
Use your fingers like a slingshot and shoot all the blocks!

• Try to hit all the blocks using your intelligence and skills in part I
• Try to hit all the blocks using two different balls in part II
• Play like billiard puzzle in part III

Get ready to enjoy more with impressive gameplay! Target at the right angle from the right point and destroy the blocks as you solve puzzles.

Features:

- Haptic feedback *
- 200 awesome levels
- 3 different game type
- Hints for each level
- Game Center leaderboards, achievements
- Simple and minimalist design
- Two different colored themes
- Can be played with one finger or two finger

Follow us for news and updates:
http://facebook.com/sapanthegame

* Haptic feedback requires iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus (iOS 10 or later)
